name: Sky Defender (WatermelonGame)
description: Congratulations, this is one of my first games and the first game I publish. This is a very simple game whose essence is to destroy as many enemies as possible and score as many points as possible. Movement in the game is realized with the help of W A S D buttons, and shots with a space or LMB. Since I lost my working project, I can't make any fixes to this game, unfortunately I will be very grateful if you support me as a developer financially, thank you
